Triangle

Class Compiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Triangle.Compiler

  • public class Compiler
extends java.lang.Object
    The main driver class for the Triangle compiler.
    Version:
    2.0 11 Aug 1999
    Author:
    Deryck F. Brown

    • Method Detail

      • compileProgram

        static boolean compileProgram(java.lang.String sourceName,
                     java.lang.String objectName,
                     boolean showingAST,
                     boolean showingTable)
        Compile the source program to TAM machine code.
        Parameters:
        sourceName - the name of the file containing the source program.
        objectName - the name of the file containing the object program.
        showingAST - true iff the AST is to be displayed after contextual analysis (not currently implemented).
        showingTable - true iff the object description details are to be displayed during code generation (not currently implemented).
        Returns:
        true iff the source program is free of compile-time errors, otherwise false.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Triangle compiler main program.
        Parameters:
        args - the only command-line argument to the program specifies the source filename.
